To install packages from this private repo, add the following to your .Rprofile

```{r eval=F}
r <- getOption("repos")
r["PRIVATE-CRAN"] <- "http://cran.us.r-project.org"
options(repos=r)
```

Once the repo has been added, you must use the `rpki` package in order to securely install packages.

```{r eval=F}
library(rpki)
pki_enable_download_file() # will prompt for pki passphrase
install.packages('private_r_package')
```
